alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Emery and eastern Sevier Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles west of Green River to 25 miles northeast of Bicknell. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Emery and eastern Sevier Counties. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 101 and 153. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 142 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
